name: v8-runtime-functions
description: Exposes and documents v8 runtime functions.

scripts.test-0.8: nave use 0.8 npm install && nave use 0.8 npm run test-main
scripts.test-0.10: nave use 0.10 npm install && nave use 0.10 npm run test-main
scripts.test-0.11: nave use 0.11 npm install && nave use 0.11 npm run test-main
scripts.test-all: npm run test-main && npm run test-0.8 && npm run test-0.10 && npm run test-0.11
scripts.test: if [ -e $TRAVIS ]; then npm run test-all; else npm run test-main; fi
